General.Name: AFC Ajax NV
General.Description: AFC Ajax NV operates a football club primarily in the Netherlands. The company also operates a stadium and an youth academy. In addition, it sells mobile tickets online. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
General.Address: Johan Cruijff Boulevard 29, Amsterdam, Netherlands, 1101 AX
